Description: Funerary papyrus of Apollonides containing Second Book of Breathing (abridged version) written in hieratic script recto and verso.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Egypt, Thebes. Collective tomb of the archon Soter. (see Herbin 2008, 111).
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 110-111, pls. 78-79.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (26)
Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.110-111, pls.78-79)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57811) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57811)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: fair - lacunae
